DOC.brief_summary: Clinical trial evaluate influence multiple aspirin administration PK PD co-administered drug
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Influence Genotype DDIs Aspirin PK/PD Clopidogrel PK Digoxin
DOC.detailed_description: Clinical trial evaluate influence genotype drug metabolize enzyme transporter drug-drug interaction aspirin co-administration pharmacokinetics / pharmacodynamics clopidogrel pharmacokinetics digoxin healthy volunteer
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 20 45 year . A body weight range 50 kg ( inclusive ) 90 kg ( exclusive ) body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.5 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) 27 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) . Sufficient ability understand nature study hazard participate . Provide write informed consent fully . inform study procedure . Presence history hypersensitivity allergic reaction drug include investigational product ( clopidogrel , digoxin aspirin ) Clinically relevant abnormal medical history could interfere objective study . A subject history gastrointestinal disease surgery ( except simple appendectomy repair hernia ) , influence absorption study drug . A subject whose lab test result follow ; Platelet count PT , aPTT < 0.9 x low limit reference range > 1.1 x upper limit reference range . A subject whose SBP 160 mmHg 90 mmHg DBP 100 mmHg 50 mmHg . Clinically significant abnormal finding ECG screen test . Presence history drug abuse positive result urine drug screen test . Participation clinical trial within 2 month first dose . Use CYP inducer ( ex . rifampin ) within 4 week first dose . Use prescription medicine , herbal medicine within 2 week overthecounter medication vitamin substance within 1 week first dose . Use grapefruit juice within 1 week first dose . Blood donation 2 month apheresis 1 month study . Use alcohol 21 units/weeks Smoking 10 cigarettes/days within 3 month first dose . Subject judge eligible study participation investigator .
